title: After game glitch.
body: So after pub stomping a game, I proceeded to hit that sweet victory button and go back to start another game. BUT, after doing so it says i am now binded to a non existent game. I know im not the only one but I would enjoy getting back on  and into a game. In the famous words of every league player ever. "riot pls". thank you and please get onto this straight away and resolve the issue.

replies.body: Servers are poop atm. Waiting it out will be your best bet. Maybe avoid playing games until it's fixed.

Open command prompt as administrator

Type:
ipconfig /renew

THEN

ipconfig /release

THEN

ipconfig /flushdns

See if that helps.
